mapper.select: SELECT IH.SalesHistoryID ,IH.SalesCompanyID ,IH.MemberID ,IH.SalesDate ,IH.SalesType ,IH.ProposalTarget ,IH.SalesMemo ,IH.SalesMemoDetail ,IH.IsDelete ,IH.LastUpdateDateTime ,IH.CreateDateTime , IM.Name FROM Insurance_SalesHistory AS IH INNER JOIN Insurance_SalesMember IM ON IH.MemberID = IM.MemberID ORDER BY SalesHistoryID DESC

SELECT IH.SalesHistoryID ,IH.SalesCompanyID ,IH.MemberID ,IH.SalesDate ,IH.SalesType ,IH.ProposalTarget ,IH.SalesMemo ,IH.SalesMemoDetail ,IH.IsDelete ,IH.LastUpdateDateTime ,IH.CreateDateTime , IM.Name FROM Insurance_SalesHistory AS IH INNER JOIN Insurance_SalesMember IM ON IH.MemberID = IM.MemberID ORDER BY SalesHistoryID DESC OFFSET #{limit} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{count} ROWS ONLY

SELECT SalesHistoryID ,SalesCompanyID ,MemberID ,SalesDate ,SalesType ,ProposalTarget ,SalesMemo ,SalesMemoDetail ,IsDelete ,LastUpdateDateTime ,CreateDateTime FROM Insurance_SalesHistory WHERE SalesHistoryID = #{salesHistoryId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Insurance_SalesHistory ( SalesCompanyID, MemberID, SalesDate, SalesType, ProposalTarget, SalesMemo, SalesMemoDetail, IsDelete, LastUpdateDateTime, CreateDateTime ) VALUES ( #{salesCompanyId}, #{memberId}, #{salesDate}, #{salesType}, #{proposalTarget}, #{salesMemo}, #{salesMemoDetail}, #{isDelete}, getdate(), getdate() )
